Text.val: 29.04.2013 SH SCR17733 Added escape characater (single quote) if a single quote is used for search
within Unicode strings (QCOL_MAGICTYPE = 'A' or 'U') to prevent SQL errors
07.09.2006 JJ Changed table access QTBL to read
09.05.2006 JJ SCR11196 date value conversion bug
Type = Alpha/Unicode and NOT 'IN' or 'NOT IN'
Type = NUMBER and NOT 'IN' or 'NOT IN'
Type = DATE and NOT 'IN' or 'NOT IN'
Type = LOGICAL and NOT 'IN' or 'NOT IN'
Logical expression which has to evaluate to

ExpSyntax.val: InStr ('1YT',Left (Trim ({0,14}),1))>0 AND Trim ({0,21})='<>' OR InStr ('0NF',Left (Trim ({0,14}),1))>0 AND Trim ({0,21})='='
